statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking
SELECT product_name, stock_count FROM inventory_tracking
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_tracking WHERE stock_count > 0
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_id = 100
SELECT product_name FROM inventory_tracking WHERE stock_count < 10 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT product_name, stock_count FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_count FROM inventory_tracking WHERE stock_count > 50 ORDER BY stock_count ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_count FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY product_id
SELECT SUM(stock_count) as total_stock FROM inventory_tracking
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_count > 0
SELECT product_name, stock_count FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_count FROM inventory WHERE stock_count > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN orders ON inventory.product_id = orders.product_id ORDER BY inventory.product_id ASC, orders.quantity DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT product_name FROM inventory WHERE stock_count < 5 UNION SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE quantity > 20
SELECT product_name, stock_count FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' OR product_name LIKE '%E' ORDER BY stock_count ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_count FROM inventory WHERE initial_stock_count < 50;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, initial_stock_count, current_stock_count FROM inventory WHERE current_stock_count < initial_stock_count;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_count FROM inventory ORDER BY current_stock_count DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, initial_stock_count AS starting_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock_count < initial_stock_count;
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT update_id, order_id, updated_stock_count, update_date FROM order_updates WHERE updated_stock_count < 50 ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_count FROM products WHERE stock_count > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, action_type, log_date FROM products JOIN inventory_logs ON products.product_id = inventory_logs.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_count FROM products WHERE stock_count > 0;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, action_type, log_date FROM products p JOIN inventory_logs l ON p.product_id = l.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, stock_count FROM inventory_items WHERE stock_count > 0;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, item_id, quantity FROM order_items ORDER BY order_id ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM inventory_items WHERE stock_count > 0;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT oi.quantity, ii.item_name FROM order_items oi JOIN inventory_items ii ON oi.item_id = ii.item_id;
